Definition: In this task, you are given the title of a five-sentence story and also the initial four sentences. Your job is write the last sentence of the story specified it seamlessly connects with the remainder of the story.

Positive Examples.input: Title: Power of Yoga. Sentence 1: Hunter just turned thirty and his body started to hurt. Sentence 2: He went to the doctor and said he wasn't flexible anymore. Sentence3: The doctor recommended Hunter try yoga. Sentence 4: Hunter signed up for yoga classes at his gym.
Positive Examples.output: A week after doing yoga every day and Hunter felt five years younger.
Positive Examples.explanation: Doctor advised Hunter to try Yoga and he started doing which made him feel like energetic.

Positive Examples.input: Title: Justin Orders Pizza. Sentence 1: Justin decided to make dinner for his boyfriend. Sentence 2: He went to the store and bought all of the ingredients. Sentence3: He started cooking but got distracted. Sentence 4: The entire meal was burnt.

Negative Examples.output: Marcus is buying clothes for a business event.
Negative Examples.explanation: Buying clothes for business event is irrevaent to the story.

Sentence3: Disgusted by this, the usher told the manager. Sentence 4: The manager allowed Justin and Josh to watch the game from his skybox.
